Reviews.Title: “Don't even think about it!”
Reviews.Author: Kittysquee
Reviews.Content: stay boyfriend booked unfortunately stay amsterdam terrible led believe double actually single card swipe door mechanism didnt girls reception screwdriver packet batteries able door en suite disgusting shared bathroom mornings washed sink bedroom horrible floor single glazed windows windows didnt feel secure looked onto bins floor uneven incline bad lie heads foot bed bed linen clean carpets stayed hostels nicer hotel recommend

Reviews.Title: “Service with a snarl, room without a lock”
Reviews.Author: KnaveSharpener
Reviews.Content: arrived tried door intercom voice hostile aggressive managed establish id booking welcome friendly belonged ginger cat happy card handed id paid eur 20 key deposit cheap cards cost eur 20 replace warned batteries door lock time try key street door lock five tries wouldnt lock upstairs werent wrong lock battery cover missing leaving batteries exposed simply didnt lock color unimpressed mine wasnt lock lost battery cover bed looked clean probably job close windows shut gale outside eventually yielded force couldnt close latch shut despite efforts directly head bed cold drafty night wind wrong direction wet security comfort tiny im frequent traveler amsterdam expecting towels provided fluffy stretch imagination scratchy soap shampoo human comforts strangely flat sachet perfume sort comes magazine covers probably fortunately id brought shampoo bottle hotel served liquid soap washstand toilet shower communal laid bed ceiling single light fitting appeared bear stain accumulated installed 1970s id guess dead moth completed picture decor outside accommodation common desperately refresh electric cables inside badly installed cheap stuck screwed wall plumbing rundown neglected feared luggage lack security trip evening necessarily brief leaving front door latch little hope id bags left thankfully settled sleep discovered bed rocked badly thats correct bed rocked thankfully telephone directory hotel thoughtfully provided size chock bed leg book id brought mattress upholstered block foam thin sheet id layers insulate cold draft window head managed sleep
